name: Blue Hawaii
instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin.
2. Flash-blend for 4 to 5 seconds with 4 ounces of crushed ice.
3. Pour into a hurricane glass over 8 ounces of crushed ice.
4. Garnish with sliced pineapple, pineapple fronds and an orchid.
description: Adapted from a recipe created in 1957 by Harry K. Yee at Henry Kaiser's Hawaiian Village Hotel (latterly the Hilton) in Waikiki, Oahu, Hawaii. The drink, created at the behest of Bols to aid sales of their blue curaçao, is named after the hit song from the 1937 Bing Crosby film, Waikiki Wedding, and not after what is generously described as a "musical-comedy" Elvis Presley 1961 film of the same name. That said, the Elvis film probably contributed to this cocktail's popularity.

ingredients.name: Light Rum
ingredients.description: White rum, also known as light or silver rum, is a type of rum that is clear and colorless. It is often unaged or aged for a very short period in stainless steel or other neutral containers, which prevents it from developing the color and flavor that result from prolonged aging in wooden barrels.

ingredients.name: Vodka
ingredients.description:
Vodka is a distilled spirit that is known for its clear and colorless appearance. It is typically produced from the fermentation and distillation of grains, potatoes, or sometimes fruits. The resulting alcohol is then often filtered and diluted with water to achieve the desired alcohol content.

Vodka is characterized by its relatively neutral taste and aroma. It is intentionally distilled to be a clean and pure spirit, allowing it to take on the characteristics of its base ingredients.

ingredients.name: Pineapple juice
ingredients.description: Pineapple juice is extracted by passing fresh, ripe pineapple through a juice extractor (juicer) or by muddling fresh cut pineapple chunks and then straining out the solids.

ingredients.name: Blue Curaçao
ingredients.description: Curaçao with added blue dye. Blue Curaçao has a sweet and slightly bitter orange flavor with citrus undertones. It is a versatile mixer, adding both color and a distinct citrusy taste to a variety of drinks, including tropical cocktails like the Blue Lagoon and the Blue Margarita.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.
